{{Server event}}

Analogous to [[/onResourceStart.md|onResourceStart]], but triggered before script files are initialised.
{{Note|This event isn't triggered within the resource starting.}}


'''Important:''' If you attach this event to the [[/root element.md|root element]] it will be called when ''any'' [[/resource.md|resource]] starts - attach it to to the [[/root element.md|root element]] of the desired resource, eg. [[/getResourceRootElement.md|getResourceRootElement]]([[/getResourceFromName.md|getResourceFromName]]("freeroam")).

==Parameters==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
resource startingResource
</syntaxhighlight> 

*'''startingResource''': The resource that is starting

==Source==
The [[/event_system#Event_source.md|source]] of this event is the root [[/element.md|element]] of the resource.

==Cancel effect==
If this event is cancelled, the resource won't begin starting.

==Example==
This code will output the name of any resource that is starting.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function displayStartingRes ( res )
	outputChatBox ( "Resource " .. getResourceName(res) .. " is going to start", getRootElement(), 255, 255, 255 )
end
addEventHandler ( "onResourcePreStart", getRootElement(), displayStartingRes )
</syntaxhighlight>

{{See also/Server event|Resource events}}
